title: Citi is Recognized by Global Finance Magazine as "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" in Latin America for the Seventh Consecutive Year
summary: In Latin America, Citi also received a total of seven regional sub-category awards and seventeen country awards in the Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks category and two country awards in the Best Consumer Internet Banks category
tag-1: Citi is Recognized by Global Finance Magazine as "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" in Latin America for the Seventh Consecutive Year
tag-2: In Latin America, Citi also received a total of seven regional sub-category awards and seventeen country awards in the Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks category and two country awards in the Best Consumer Internet Banks category
tag-3: Miami – Citi has been named for the seventh consecutive year by Global Finance magazine as the "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" in Latin America in the magazine's World's Best Internet Banks 2013 Awards. Citi was also recognized as "Best Global Overall Internet Bank" and "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" at the global level.
tag-4: Global Finance's World's Best Internet Bank Awards are based on submissions from banks that wish to be considered. This year, 250 individual banks from around the world entered the competition. Representatives from Infosys, a global leader in consulting, technology and outsourcing solutions, comprised the judging panel. Based on the judge's evaluations, Global Finance's editors made the final selections.
tag-5: Winners were selected based on strength of strategy for attracting and servicing online customers, success in getting clients to use web offerings, growth of online customer base, breadth of products offered, evidence of tangible benefits gained from Internet initiatives, and web site design and functionality. Sub-category winners were selected on the basis of relative strength products and services.
tag-6: "We are very proud of this recognition and continue being committed to bringing the best Corporate and Institutional internet capabilities to our clients in the region," said Fernando Iraola, Latin America Region Head, Treasury and Trade Solutions.
